item.title: Need a hoster
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

You find someone with a serverbox and great bandwidth. I host 2 servers for my clan, called the Zion Mainframe. I converted my old serverbox which I used to hold a small IRC network, to a gaming server, and upgraded it’s bandwidth to T1, to accept and hold more connections. Yes the Zion Mainframe is from Animatrix, it’s essentially 2 servers that are linked Via server to Server chat (Thanks to Miss Silabsoft) and are used only for education and learning processes for my clan to adapt, and enhance in their coding skills.

Additionally you could also get a professional hosting service, however most services will refuse to host a pirate runescape server. Also I got this question earlier, “Can we come onto your server and play?” No, because:

  1. It’s for my clan
  2. It’s only for education and testing not for recreation.

Most hosters on these forums won’t be able to support more than 10 users comfortably, even with hamachi, as most users here either have a DSL/cable connection.

My serverbox sits in my basement under aircondition all day long and runs 24/7, and it’s made to host, and it overheats quite a bit when I’ve got 30-40 connections.

Read full topic
